title: Justice Department will narrow its focus on crypto-related enforcement
description: WASHINGTON (AP) — The Justice Department is disbanding a team of prosecutors who targeted cryptocurrency crimes and is shifting its focus away from complex crypto-related cases involving banking and securities law, according to a memo reviewed by The Associated Press. “The Department of Justice is not a digital assets regulator,” Deputy Attorney General Todd Blanche […]

title: Hawk Tuah Goes Hollywood, Films Cameo for Glen Powell's Show 'Chad Powers'
description: Hawk Tuah’s back on the grind after that crypto mess -- and she's made her way to Hollywood for a cameo in Glen Powell’s new Hulu series "Chad Powers," TMZ has learned. Yep, you definitely heard these two names in the same sentence -- sources…
